Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.CharacterSheet
    This class serves only to allow deserialization of old components.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.ComponentFace
    This class serves only to allow deserialization of old components.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    ca.cgjennings.platform.PlatformSupport.PLATFORM_IS_OSX
    Alias for PlatformSupport.PLATFORM_IS_MAC.
    ca.cgjennings.ui.FilteredListModel.ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER
    Use FilteredListModel.acceptAllFilter() to get a typed filter that accepts all items.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.AbstractGameComponentEditor.forceRerender()
    Replaced by AbstractGameComponentEditor.redrawPreview().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.AbstractGameComponent.idealScaleForImage​(double, double, double, double)
    Use ImageUtilities.idealCoveringScaleForImage(double, double, double, double).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.AbstractGameComponent.imagePathToImage​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.get(java.lang.String) to load user-supplied images.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.component.DefaultPortrait.setFacesToUpdate​(int)
    It is preferable, and easier, to use DefaultPortrait.setFacesToUpdate(int[]).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.deck.Deck.isAutoBleedMarginEnabled()
    Use Deck.getFinishStyle() and Deck.getBleedMarginWidth().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.deck.Deck.setAutoBleedMarginEnabled​(boolean)
    Use Deck.setFinishStyle(ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.FinishStyle) and Deck.setBleedMarginWidth(double).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.dialog.prefs.FillInPreferenceCategory.addHelp​(String, String, boolean)
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.getCardVersion()
    Replaced by DIY.getVersion().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.setCardVersion​(int)
    Replaced by DIY.setVersion(int).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.diy.DIY.upgradeOldPropertyNames()
    This should only be called in an onRead function when upgrading very old DIY components.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.NewEditorDialog.getIconForComponent​(GameComponent)
    No suitable replacement yet, but don't want people to start using it.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.BundleInstaller.isFXRuntimeAvailable()
    This method returns false.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.packBundle​(File, File)
    The Pack200 tools used by this method have been removed from Java. Calling this method will copy the file without changes.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.unpackBundle​(File, File)
    The Pack200 tools used by this method have been removed from Java. Calling this method on a packed file will throw an exception.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.InstalledBundleObject.getRepresentativeImage()
    Use InstalledBundleObject.getIcon().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.Plugin.getRepresentativeImage()
    Prefer Plugin.getPluginIcon().
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.PluginContext.addGameText​(Locale, String)
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.PluginContext.addUIText​(Locale, String)
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.PluginContext.getGameLocale()
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.PluginContext.getUILocale()
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.ScriptConsole.getErrorAtPoint​(Point)  
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.PortraitPanel.finalize()
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project.PublishBundle.publish​(File, int)
    Takes an integer compression method for backwards compatibility. Use PublishBundle.publish(java.io.File, ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.catalog.PluginBundlePublisher.CompressionMethod) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.project.Rename.rename​(Member, String)
    Replaced by Member.renameFile(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.Sheet.centerTitle​(Graphics2D, String, Rectangle, Font, float, boolean)
    Included for backwards compatibility with old plug-ins; use Sheet.drawTitle(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.lang.String, java.awt.Rectangle, java.awt.Font, float, int) instead.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.Sheet.paint​(RenderTarget, double, boolean)
    Use Sheet.setUserBleedMargin(double) to set the desired bleed margin size, then call Sheet.paint(ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.RenderTarget, double) to paint the image.
    ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.sheet.Sheet.synthesizeBleedMargin​(BufferedImage, boolean, double)
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.GlowFilter.getDistance()
    Replaced by GlowFilter.getBlurRadius().
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.filters.GlowFilter.setDistance​(int)
    Replaced by GlowFilter.setBlurRadius(int).
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.ImageUtilities.createCustomCursor​(BufferedImage, int, int)
    Use ResourceKit.createCustomCursor(java.lang.String, java.awt.Point, java.lang.String, java.awt.Cursor).
    ca.cgjennings.graphics.shapes.SVGVectorImage.finalize()
    ca.cgjennings.imageio.SimpleImageWriter.finalize()
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.fetchImage​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.get(java.lang.String) to load user images so that you can work with both bitmap and vector images transparently.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.getMissingImage()
    Use StrangeImage to load user images and ResourceKit.getMissingImage() or StrangeImage.getMissingImage() to get the missing image as a BufferedImage or StrangeImage, respectively.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.imageExists​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.exists(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.isURLString​(String)
    Use StrangeImage to load user images and !StrangeImage.isFileIdentifier( identifier ) as a replacement for this call.
    ca.cgjennings.layout.GraphicStyleFactory.translatePathToImageURL​(String)
    Use StrangeImage.identifierToURL(java.lang.String).
    ca.cgjennings.layout.MarkupRenderer.addLibrary​(String)  
    ca.cgjennings.ui.JHelpButton.setWikiPage​(String)
    ca.cgjennings.ui.wizard.WizardPanel.setLayout​(LayoutManager)
    This class uses its own internal layout manager and does not support setting a different manager.
    gamedata.Expansion.getSymbol​(boolean)
    This method is provided to ease migration from SE 2.x. It is equivalent to calling getSymbol( inverse ? 1 : 0 ).
    gamedata.Expansion.register​(Game, String, String, String, String, String)
    This method is provided to ease migration from SE 2.x. It should not be called by plug-in authors.
    gamedata.Expansion.setGameForExpansion​(String, String)
    This method is used only to allow backwards compatibility with script code from SE 2.x. It should not be called by plug-in authors.
    gamedata.Game.getMasterSettings()
    Replaced by Game.getSettings().
    gamedata.Game.register​(String, String, BufferedImage)
    Prefer methods that take an icon or image resource.
    resources.ResourceKit.createBleedBanner​(Image)
    resources.ResourceKit.getMicroversionString()
    The complex microversion string has been replaced by a simple build number that is easier to compare when enabling version-dependent features. To obtain the build number, call StrangeEons.getBuildNumber().
    resources.ResourceKit.getTinyFont()
    This is no longer used within the application, and it is recommended not to use it in plug-ins or other projects as it may be removed in a future version.
